attributes.action: the government to give more funding to provide more homeless shelters.
attributes.additional_details: to get more homeless people off the streets and provide them with the basic human needs they need to survive. for example hot meals. 78% of homeless people sleep rough in Birmingham on the average. WE NEED CHANGE TO HAPPEN
attributes.background: to open more homeless shelters and help younger homeless people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631032
